title: Ranked Teams in patch 6.13
body: Since the re-introduction of ranked teams If I play with my team is the ranking system separate from ranked solo queue like it used to be? I hope this is the case as I don't like if you do really well in solo queue but get demoted because your ranked team isn't performing. Leave a comment letting everyone know if solo and team ranks are separate.

replies.body: Ranked Team are completely separate from solo rank, however it may use your ranked solo and/or normal game MMR for initial seeding to put you against roughly the same MMR teams before you complete your first five games with a team. You can be apart of 5 teams at once, and all will have its individual rank with LP and MMR, which have always remained separate from solo/dynamic LP and MMR
